name: GameSTON
description: GameSTON is a blockchain-based cryptocurrency specifically designed for the gaming industry. It serves as a medium of exchange within gaming ecosystems, facilitating transactions such as in-game purchases, asset trading, and reward distributions. GameSTON aims to offer a decentralized, secure, and transparent platform for gamers, developers, and other stakeholders to interact and transact value seamlessly. With features like smart contracts and non-fungible tokens (NFTs), GameSTON enables unique gaming experiences and enhances the economics of virtual worlds.
